flawed_nl_solution:
If she bought a 500 pages book and wrote on 150 pages, the number of empty pages remaining is 500-150 = <<500-150=350>>350 pages.
She then wrote on 30/100*350 = <<30/100*350=3500/3>>3500/3 pages
The number of remaining empty pages is 350-3500/3 = <<350-3500/3=-2450/3>>-2450/3 pages.
When she spilled coffee on the remaining empty pages, the number of damaged pages was 20/100*-2450/3 = <<20/100*-2450/3=-490/3>>-490/3
The number of empty pages remaining that she could write on is -2450/3--490/3 = <<-2450/3--490/3=-1960/3>>-1960/3 pages
#### -1960/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 105, not 3500/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
